mapper.select: SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.decision_date,'%Y-%m') 'period', count(*) 'count', sum(b.punish_money) 'money' FROM tcase a LEFT JOIN tcase_handle b on b.case_id=a.id WHERE a.del_flag='0' AND DATE_FORMAT(a.decision_date,'%Y-%m') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{dateFrom},'%Y-%m') AND DATE_FORMAT(a.decision_date,'%Y-%m') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{dateTo},'%Y-%m') GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(a.decision_date,'%Y-%m') ORDER BY DATE_FORMAT(a.decision_date,'%Y-%m')
